DOC.detailed_description: This single-centre , double-blind , placebo-controlled , cross-over trial 32 healthy volunteer two session ( I II ) . Each session consist run-in day baseline assessment , 13 treatment day 5 additional day assessment . Subjects randomize start either prucalopride placebo session . Between 2 session , washout period 14 21 day , avoid carry-over effect .
